meanings.definition: A yellow crystalline compound found in plants and used in dyeing and tanning.
meanings.sent1: The xanthins from the plant were used to create a vibrant yellow dye.
meanings.sent2: The xanthins extracted from the flower petals added a beautiful hue to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally spilled xanthins all over itself, turning yellow in an instant.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of xanthins, spreading joy and color everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with xanthins, casting a warm glow over the landscape.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of yellow pigments occurring in plants and animals.
meanings.sent1: Scientists discovered various xanthins in the petals of the sunflowers.
meanings.sent2: The vibrant feathers of the bird contained a mix of different xanthins.
meanings.sent3: The garden was a riot of colors, with xanthins peeking out from every corner.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a splash of xanthins, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The forest glowed with xanthins as the sunlight filtered through the leaves.
